query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS ab_test_experiments (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  applicationId INT,
  userId INT,
  name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  description TEXT,
  targetType ENUM('deployment', 'container', 'service') DEFAULT 'deployment' NOT NULL,
  targetName VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  namespace VARCHAR(255),
  status ENUM('draft', 'running', 'paused', 'completed', 'cancelled') DEFAULT 'draft' NOT NULL,
  variantAName VARCHAR(100) DEFAULT 'Control' NOT NULL,
  variantAScaleUpThreshold INT NOT NULL,
  variantAScaleDownThreshold INT NOT NULL,
  variantACooldown INT DEFAULT 300 NOT NULL,
  variantAMinReplicas INT DEFAULT 1 NOT NULL,
  variantAMaxReplicas INT DEFAULT 10 NOT NULL,
  variantBName VARCHAR(100) DEFAULT 'Treatment' NOT NULL,
  variantBScaleUpThreshold INT NOT NULL,
  variantBScaleDownThreshold INT NOT NULL,
  variantBCooldown INT DEFAULT 300 NOT NULL,
  variantBMinReplicas INT DEFAULT 1 NOT NULL,
  variantBMaxReplicas INT DEFAULT 10 NOT NULL,
  trafficSplitPercent INT DEFAULT 50 NOT NULL,
  startedAt TIMESTAMP NULL,
  endedAt TIMESTAMP NULL,
  durationHours INT DEFAULT 24 NOT NULL,
  winnerVariant ENUM('A', 'B', 'inconclusive'),
  winnerConfidence INT,
  winnerReason TEXT,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3FbHQcBqwdUAeZd.daf6bd01f5d9 --database bVoJhS4CeCN2GuJxoMncsM --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS ab_test_experiments (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  applicationId INT,
  userId INT,
  name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  description TEXT,
  targetType ENUM('deployment', 'container', 'service') DEFAULT 'deployment' NOT NULL,
  targetName VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  namespace VARCHAR(255),
  status ENUM('draft', 'running', 'paused', 'completed', 'cancelled') DEFAULT 'draft' NOT NULL,
  variantAName VARCHAR(100) DEFAULT 'Control' NOT NULL,
  variantAScaleUpThreshold INT NOT NULL,
  variantAScaleDownThreshold INT NOT NULL,
  variantACooldown INT DEFAULT 300 NOT NULL,
  variantAMinReplicas INT DEFAULT 1 NOT NULL,
  variantAMaxReplicas INT DEFAULT 10 NOT NULL,
  variantBName VARCHAR(100) DEFAULT 'Treatment' NOT NULL,
  variantBScaleUpThreshold INT NOT NULL,
  variantBScaleDownThreshold INT NOT NULL,
  variantBCooldown INT DEFAULT 300 NOT NULL,
  variantBMinReplicas INT DEFAULT 1 NOT NULL,
  variantBMaxReplicas INT DEFAULT 10 NOT NULL,
  trafficSplitPercent INT DEFAULT 50 NOT NULL,
  startedAt TIMESTAMP NULL,
  endedAt TIMESTAMP NULL,
  durationHours INT DEFAULT 24 NOT NULL,
  winnerVariant ENUM('A', 'B', 'inconclusive'),
  winnerConfidence INT,
  winnerReason TEXT,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);
